attributes.action: Free admission for Museums and Art Galleries
attributes.additional_details:
Museums and Art Galleries have played an integral role to our communities throughout the United Kingdom. They allow the public to learn, understand and appreciate the past and heritage in a friendly and well maintained environment.

Some museums however  are starting to charge, in the belief that this will maintain the standards we so foundly love. This does not need to be case; these alongside Art Galleries can generate funds in exibitions, work days and other projects without the need for an admission fee.

The consumption of the past and the passion, excitement  and an intrigue for art does not need a price. Let Museums and Art Galleries be free!
